entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few showers ending overnight then partly cloudy. Risk of thundershowers this evening. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 8:35 PM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 13 except 7 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. High 13 except 7 along parts of the coast. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 8:35 PM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023
